5D226A2C.Line1.B684A: I haven't seen one of these in a while... from what I have heard, these require a special acid flux applied to them, to allow clean extraction of the gems within.

F716E3AE.Line3.B684A: I'm afraid that's all I know about it. You should seek out Mislan in Zarbinzet to acquire the flux. I am sure he wouldn't mind if you used his bench to apply it too, the process is quite safe and simple.
